ink initials: Metaphorical representation of something that leaves an everlasting impression through interconnected first letters.', "Inseparable signifiers: Words whose initials are so closely linked initials: The first letters of words that hold sway over one another's significance or interpretation due to their interconnected nature.", 'Intertwined linguistic links: A phrase representing two or more words whose initials are entwined, reflecting a deeper connection between them.', 'Ingeniously linked lexemes: Words that have been carefully chosen and arranged so that their starting letters
